alert.note: Alert for Aurora; Beadle; Brookings; Brule; Jerauld; Kingsbury; Miner; Sanborn (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 11 at 1:45PM MST until January 12 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM FRIDAY TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central and south central South Dakota. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Friday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 PM Friday to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Aurora; Beadle; Brookings; Brule; Jerauld; Kingsbury; Miner; Sanborn
